commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: The winning team of the aqua course race is Aqours! Congrats!

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Yay! Thanks a bunch.

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Thank you, zura!

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: *Sob* We lost...our precious shaved ice!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I gave it everything I had, so I have no regrets. Congratulations, You and Hanamaru!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Honestly, I still can't believe that Hanamaru finished in first place. Never in a million years would I have picked her to win.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Hanamaru was in last place for the whole race, wasn't she? It must have been some miracle for her to finish ahead of everyone else.

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: I'm surprised myself, zura.

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Hmm... I think it's 'cause she didn't fall when that wave rocked the whole course. Pretty sure Hanamaru was the only one standing afterward.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Oh, that makes sense. We were all gathered at the top of the slide, so we all got knocked off balance. Hanamaru, on the other hand...

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: She was trudging far behind us, so she managed to avoid the mayhem. What a dramatic turn of events, going from last to first.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: I cannot believe something so ridiculous would turn all of us around like that...

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Huh? What's this rocking everyone's talking about?

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: What? It was super wobbly right at that last slide! It was all like, WHOOSH! We all got knocked off course because of it.

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Really? All I was thinking about was getting to the finish line and chowing down on shaved ice! I guess I wasn't paying attention to anything else around me, zura.

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: You're kidding me.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Mighty is the power of one's appetite.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: In any case, a win is a win. Time to fetch the winning team their prize. Let's go get that super-loaded shaved ice.

commands.speaker: You, Hanamaru
commands.line: Yay!

commands.speaker: You, Hanamaru
commands.line: Time to eat!

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: *Munch* *Munch* Mmm! It's so delicious, zura!

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: The ice is so light and crunchy! My mouth is filled with sugary, fruity delights!

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: This is bliss, zura. This is pure joy in a bowl, zura!

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: You can say that again! I didn't know ice could be so soft. It melts away the second it hits your tongue!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Both of you look like you're really enjoying yourselves. It's almost as though I'm eating one myself!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: There's only one order of shaved ice left, too. What a close shave.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Hmm...

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: How long are you gonna sulk for? They won fair and square. You shouldn't have any qualms.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: But I do. This was an accidental victory caused by the rolling of the waves. It is not reflective of everybody's true abilities.

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: We should hold a rematch to find the true victors!

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: E-Excuse me? You want to race again?!

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: That's right! There's still one more order of shaved ice. Therefore, I hereby declare the second aqua course race for the last shaved ice!

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: A second race?! I'm in! I wanna go again!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: They do say luck is a kind of skill as well... But it doesn't seem like Umi's in the mood to listen.

commands.speaker: Maki
commands.line: Wait, ugh! Would you all give it a rest already?!
